author: Kaushalya Premachandra
title: Euclid Net-Cardano-Data Analytics
description: Data Analytics solutions in decision-making are not accessible to many sectors in society,specially the 'common man' in the developing world

assessments.note: The problem statement is a bit vague, why does the "common man" need access to Data-Analytics solutions ? The solution is also not very specific i.e. what types of data sets are you intending to analyse and for what specific outcome or to assist with what type of decisions ? there are lots of Data Analytics tools available, how does your proposed tool distinguish from these ? . The proposal mentions that they want to use Cardano to benefit from it's decentralization, scalability and and authenticity which makes sense, but there's is no mention on how they would integrate a Data Analytics tools with blockchain technology and Cardano specifically.
assessments.reply: The proposal clearly states how our start-up impacts the common man and how we plan to integrate data analytics into block chain technology, under the 'detailed plan' title of the proposal. The proposal also mentions that we will be using 'big data' (type of data). Moreover, our proposal clearly mentions that what we propose is not a 'product or a solution (Dapp)' but a start-up company that will integrate data analytics and block chain techonogy to develop solutions (Dapps) to help people make sensible decisions.

assessments.note:
This proposal has potential if it focuses on describing its solution by identifying a specific real problem.
The current problem statement is vague and lacks precision in attracting new users to the Cardano ecosystems. It doesn't fully address fund 5 Dapps & integration objectives. Please think of these questions: Will this proposal only focus on Sri-lanka? will the data collected focus on Sri Lanka, Asia, or will it be global. How do you plan to sustain the flow of information? How will you be acquiring the data?
assessments.reply: We are not proposing a specific solution to a specifc problem. Our objective is to establish a start-up that will integrate data analytics and block chain techonogy to develop solutions to help people to make decisions. When I spoke to the organizers of the Catalyst program they directed me to submit this proposal under 'Dapp and Integration category'. Moreover, we have also specifically mentioned how we plan to attract users into cardano ecosystem under the 'detailed proposal' title in the proposal.

assessments.note: It is not stated, how exactly Cardano will be used in the dApps that are planned and therefore it is really hard map the proposal to the challenge. Having a company that actively tries to find applications for Cardano in Data Analytics might still be beneficial for Cardano and the requested budget is pretty low. Therefore I go with a neutral scoring.
assessments.reply: The proposal clearly mentions how cardano is used in developing Dapps once we initiate the start-up, under the 'detailed plan' title of the proposal. Please note that the main aim in the proposal is to initiate a data analytics start-up that integrate cardano block chain technology since this is a novel concept in Sri Lanka.

assessments.note: There is no correlation between what will be in the Euclid net site and its relation to Cardano. The vision to increase Cardano proliferation in Sri Lanka is noble and need to be encouraged but the proposal seems to serve no such purpose.
assessments.reply: We don't understand what the assessor means by 'Euclid Net site'. However, by this statement if he/she means the Euclid Net webiste, then we still haven't launched a website for Euclid Net start-up. We strongly disagree that the proposal does not show how the company's vision serve the purpose sice the detailed proposal mentions this very clearly.

assessments.note: Please detail the end use product you will produce. " The DApps our company will develop provide decentralized real-time data related products and services. " This doesn't say what you are doing, let alone a plan for how you will do it.
assessments.reply: This is a very unfair statement and sounds like the assessor has not read the proposal clearly. We have specifically mentoned that this proposal is not related to a 'specific end product' but a start-up company that will develop products and services using data analytics and cardano block chain technology.

assessments.note:
Integrating Blockchain technology with Data-analytics is a big undertaking and it's not clear if the team has the experience to implement such a proposal. The team is composed of 3 academics, which universities ? have they publish there work on research journals ? Whats the CV of the "accomplished" industrialists (LinkedIn profiles) ?. 
Overall this reads like a concept rather then an executable proposal. What type of data do you intend to analyse ? for what purpose and with what tools ? how will you access that data ?. The proposal mentions it aims to serve in "the fields of finance, wild-life ecology, supply chain management, traffic control systems, health and education sectors"  but this is very broad. The roadmap (which is detailed under the KPI section) does not address any of the questions above, only describes administrative and organizational steps. It comes across as the team what's funding to start thinking about the problem/solution (e.g. "Establishing the Research and Development department"), these should have been formulated beforehand.
assessments.reply: The proposal clearly states that the objective of the proposal is to establish a start-up company that integrates cardano blockchain technology with Data analytics to provide solutions to the society. The KPIs were developed to establish the company and not to adress the pointers the assessor has pointed out. Moreover, if the Ctalyst program requests our credentials we are more than willing to provide all our credentials.

assessments.note: It is likely for this proposal to be implemented because it includes a straightforward Webdesign plan. The core question to be answered are: What data will you be tracking? Will the data be open source and free? How will these data analytic benefit the Cardano community? How will this data analytics be collected?

The proposal itself is about the registration of a company. This should be possible by most people and therefore no special references are needed. I would still prefer to have some public references for the knowledge that is stated. (xxx years of experiienc in data analytics, ...)
assessments.reply: We are happy to provide information about our experience

assessments.note: The proposers claim 15 years of combined experience in academics and industry. However, they have not specified which industry or which academic experience. No validating references are also enclosed in the proposal.
assessments.reply: We strongly disagree with this rating and the rationale. The assessor seems to assess the proposal only by the experience of the proposers and not by reading the presented plan. However, we are happy to provide information about our experience and credentials.

assessments.note: Using the funds to set up shop and hire unspecified interns can hardly be considered a success.
assessments.reply: We strongly disagree with this rationale. The proposal has clearly presented the plan and the 15 years of experience in the industry is capable of guiding the interns properly.

assessments.note: No description of what is actually being produced other than data related products and services. Please detail what you will produce and how this addresses the challenge.
assessments.reply: The proposal clearly states that the objective is 'to establish a start-up company' that will integrate data analytics and cardano blockchain techonogy to develop solutions to help people to make decisions.This addresse the challenge becasue we will be developing products and servicies (Eg. Dapps) once the company is established.

assessments.note: There are no success criteria defined, so it's not possible for the community to assess impact of the proposal. The roadmap/milestones are described under the KPI section and these are tangible but very unambitious for the scope of the proposal.

The current roadmap only focuses on web development.
This project needs a detailed roadmap of the project Data analytics deliverable. What are the milestones or steps to fully integrate this web product and real-world data?
The proposal is about the registration of a company. KPIs and budget breakdown is provided. All necessary information is available.
The proposal is not clear on what is planned to be achieved. There is no specific goal regarding what type of data analytic solution is aimed at in the proposal.  It is not auditable.
assessments.reply: The proposal clearly presented the plan of the objective which is to establish a start-up company that will integrate date analytics and cardano blockchain technology to develop solutions to help people to make decisions.

assessments.note: The team is unknown to the reader. Why would accomplished academics and industrialists shy away from providing who they are? The information provides is insufficient to audtio the progress and success of the proposal.
assessments.reply: The propsal clearly mentions how to measure success of the proposal in the KPI's given. We are happy to provide information about our experience.

solution: We propose a mechanism to make the benefits of data analytics solutions available to broader society using Cardano blockchain technology.
experience: Team: 3 academics and 2 accomplished industrialists with experience for over 15 years in data analytics, business dev & entrepreneurship
